title: Young and Old
description:
Jeff C, Zoe, and Tom Coleman share stories about shooting a skunk, surviving a predator, and an ending and beginning for a family.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ray Harris, The Fusion Experience, Jeff C, Zoe, Matracia, Tom Coleman, The Beatles, Bonny Light Horseman, Kevin Allison)
